name: Saint Emiliana
description:
Emiliana lives a simple life as a nun in the remote village of Zamak.
One day, Marisus soldiers appear in the village's market on a Witch Hunt. There they capture Emiliana's sister, Raula, accusing her of being a Witch.
In order to save her sister, Emiliana exchanges her soul for the power of a Witch. Now, Emiliana must wrestle with her faith as she searches for her sister.Features:
Classic RPG Experience
Fantasy Setting
Turn-based Combat
Leveling System
"Demon Flame" System
